David Bankole Adeleye (amụrụ na 16 Nọvemba n'afọ 1996) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Britain
Dị ka onye na-amụta ihe, ọ sonyere na 2013 English National Junior Championships na ihe omume dị arọ.

A mụrụ David Bankole Adeleye na 16 Nọvemba n'afo 1996 na London, England, nwa nke nne na nna nke Naijiria sitere na Ikole na Ekiti State, Nigeria. Nne na nna Adeleye achọghị ka ọ banye n'egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị elu. Mgbe Adeleye na-etolite, ọ masịrị Lennox Lewis, Muhammad Ali na Roy Jones Jr.

Adeleye malitere ịkụ ọkpọ na Dale Youth Club, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, n'okpuru nkuzi nke Gary McGuiness. Ọ bu onye mmeri Junior ABA na 2013, ma merie Senior ABA Novices na 2017 tupu ọ merie Senior UBA title na 2018. O mechara nọchite anya England na mba ụwa megide Denmark na 2018 wee nweta ọla edo na British Universities and Colleges Sport Boxing Championships.

Na 12 Julaị n'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara na Adeleye aghọwo ọkachamara n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ Queensberry Promotions nke Frank Warren. Adeleye mere nke mbụ ya na 21 Disemba n'afọ 2019, na undercard nke Daniel Dubois megide Kyotaro Fujimoto maka WBC Silver heavyweight title na Copper Box Arena na London. Onye na-ekpe ikpe, Mark Bates, kpọrọ ka a kwụsị usoro ahụ ka Adeleye meriri onye ọgụ Lithunaian Dmitrij Kalinovskij site na ịkụ aka (TKO) na agba nke mbụ. N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2020, Adeleye laghachiri na agba nke abụọ na Matt Gordon na BT Sport Studio na London. Agha nke atọ Adeleye bụ nloghachi na BT Sport Studio na 29 Ọgọstụ megide Phil Williams, onye Adeleye kwụsịrị na agba nke atọ, nweta mmeri nke atọ ya n'usoro.
Adeleye, onye jikọtara ịkụ ọkpọ na ọmụmụ ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na n'afọ 2018 na Mahadum Wolverhampton na nzere na Business Management, nke edemede ya dị na akụkụ azụmahịa nke ịkụ ọkpọ.
